title: Orientation problem on iOS with GameCenter

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • Calling the screen orientation changes from portrait to landscape mode, even if the project is set to use portrait mode only

sections.title: Cause
content: If you are using the iOS presentation controller, this could override your orientation constraints.

sections.title: Resolution
content: As a workaround, you can modify the iOS trampoline code to use only the portrait mode.
